Package keystore_tutorial

Class ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi

java.lang.Object
java.security.KeyStoreSpi
keystore_tutorial.DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
keystore_tutorial.ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi
public class ReloadingPemFileKeyStoreSpi extends DelegatingKeyStoreSpi
KeyStoreSpi implementation that hot-reloads certificates and private keys from PEM files when the backing files change.
